creator: colin.wong@redknee.com
text:
Attempting to perform dos to unix conversion in text files will fail if you 
happen to have a very long line.  In my case, I have a text file with a single 
line that is 14564 characters long.  Other files (text) in the same directories 
will pass successfully.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
